typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	filename as string
}
source(output(
		year as short,
		{ month} as short,
		carrier as string,
		carrier_name as string,
		airport as string,
		airport_name as string,
		arr_flights as short,
		arr_del15 as short,
		carrier_ct as double,
		{ weather_ct} as double,
		nas_ct as double,
		security_ct as double,
		late_aircraft_ct as double,
		arr_cancelled as short,
		arr_diverted as short,
		{ arr_delay} as short,
		{ carrier_delay} as short,
		weather_delay as short,
		nas_delay as short,
		security_delay as short,
		late_aircraft_delay as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($filename)]) ~> srccsv
srccsv derive(arr_del15 = iif(isNull(arr_del15),toInteger(1000),toInteger(arr_del15))) ~> assignvaluetonull
assignvaluetonull sink(input(
		year as integer,
		month as integer,
		carrier as string,
		carrier_name as string,
		airport as string,
		airport_name as string,
		arr_flights as integer,
		arr_del15 as integer,
		carrier_ct as decimal(5,2),
		weather_ct as decimal(3,2),
		nas_ct as decimal(5,2),
		security_ct as decimal(3,2),
		late_aircraft_ct as decimal(4,2),
		arr_cancelled as integer,
		arr_diverted as integer,
		arr_delay as integer,
		carrier_delay as integer,
		weather_delay as integer,
		nas_delay as integer,
		security_delay as integer,
		late_aircraft_delay as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	batchSize: 20000,
	mapColumn(
		year,
		month = { month},
		carrier,
		carrier_name,
		airport,
		airport_name,
		arr_flights,
		arr_del15,
		carrier_ct,
		weather_ct = { weather_ct},
		nas_ct,
		security_ct,
		late_aircraft_ct,
		arr_cancelled,
		arr_diverted,
		arr_delay = { arr_delay},
		carrier_delay = { carrier_delay},
		weather_delay,
		nas_delay,
		security_delay,
		late_aircraft_delay
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> destsqldw
